excerpt.as_written: حي الفؤاد إلى الأرض القدس / يا أحلى يا ليتها من بلاد الله لي وطني / او ليتني زرتها قبل الممات  عشار في السما في كرامتها يخلصني
يا رب اغفر لمن هذه مقالة واغفر لمن هو بالإيمان قد أنمي

contents.label: Poem 2 (ff. 4v-10r), On the First Miracle of Saint George, Incipit (f. 4v), Desinit (f. 10r)
Poem 3 (ff. 10v-13r), On the Second Miracle of Saint George, Incipit (f. 10v), Desinit (f. 13r)
Poem 8 (ff. 23r-24r), To Our Lady, Incipit (f. 23r), Desinit (f. 24r)

note: This is a collection of poems apparently by a single author. The poems and the collection are untitled: 1. My heart yearns for the land of Jerusalem, my abode, may it please God to make it my homeland; 2. Lord, I am concerned with the marvels of George ...; 3. The second marvel of St. George ...; 4. The nature of the fast; 5. Praise God, O all peoples, praise God day and night; 6. O my eyes, do not weep for the dead ...; 7. Praise God, O all peoples, the Lord of Lords, the Omniscient; 8. I beheld the birth of the Virgin ....

note.value: Rubric on f. 1v: بسم الله الحي الأزلي على بركة الله
